CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
A            	AGRICULTURE                      	AGRI                       
B            	PLEASURE                         	PLEA                      
C            	CIVIL CLUB                       	CCLB                       
D            	FAA OPERATIONS                   	FAA                       
E            	EXPERIMENTAL TEST FLIGHT         	EXPR                       
F            	FERRY                           	FERY                       
G            	TEST FLIGHT                      	TEST                       
H            	HELICOPTER EXTERNAL LOAD         	HELI                      
I            	INDUSTRIAL                       	INDU                       
J            	FOREST FIRE                      	FIRE                      
K            	SKY DIVING FREE FALL             	SKYD                       
L            	PARACHUTE STATIC                 	PARA                      
M            	MILITARY CLUB                    	MCLB                       
N            	NONE OR OTHER                    	OTHR                       
O            	EMERGENCY PARACHUTE              	EPAR                       
P            	AIR SHOW                         	SHOW                       
Q            	FAA FLIGHT CHECK                 	CHCK                       
R            	AIR MAIL                         	MAIL                      
S            	PASSENGERS                       	APAX                       
T            	CARGO                            	ACAR                       
U            	PASSENGERS AND CARGO            	PXCG                      
V            	GLIDER                           	GLID                       
W            	UNKNOWN                          	UNKN                      
X            	TRAINING                         	TRNG                       
Y            	AIR AMBULANCE                    	AMBL                       
1            	BALLISTIC PARACHUTE              	BPAR                       
2            	BANNER TOW                       	BTOW                       
3            	HOT AIR BALLOON                  	BALN                       
99999        	TYPE FLY-SEC INVALID             	ERROR MESSAGE
